articles.author: Chris Bumbaca, USA TODAY
articles.title: 'It feels like we let our country down': US women’s hockey team falls to Canada in gold medal game at Beijing Winter Olympics - USA TODAY
articles.description: Canada jumped out to a 3-0 lead and held on for a 3-2 victory over the U.S. to capture the women's hockey gold medal. The Americans take silver.
articles.content:
BEIJING — The waiting is not intended to be cruel, but it is. 
For more than three years, the U.S. women’s hockey team worked to repeat as gold medal winners at the Beijing Olympics. Instead, the Am… [+5576 chars]

articles.author: Amanda Morris, Maggie Astor
articles.title: Vulnerable to Covid, High-Risk Americans Feel Left Behind - The New York Times
articles.description: Transplant recipients, cancer patients and millions of other Americans with risk factors feel ignored and abandoned as their neighbors, and their government, seek a return to normal.
articles.content: More than seven million adults in the United States, or about 3 percent, are characterized by health professionals as immunocompromised because of a disease, medication or other treatment that weaken… [+950 chars]

articles.author: Mike Blanchfield, Jordan Press
articles.title: Most donors to 'Adopt-a-Trucker' GiveSendGo page were Canadian, new leaked data shows - The Globe and Mail
articles.description: A new data leak shows that about 60 per cent of donors to an ‘Adopt-a-Trucker’ page on online fundraising platform GiveSendGo were Canadian and 37 per cent were American
